data.title: Top accommodation in Sisak, Croatia
data.meta_description: Apartments, rooms, holiday homes and cheap private accommodation in Sisak, Croatia for rent (2024). Contact directly owners of private accommodation and rent apartment, room or holiday home in Sisak, Croatia and save up to 40%! Sisak is the capital of Sisak-Moslavina County in Croatia. It is situated at the mouth of river Kupa in the river Sava, the fertile and marshy area of Pannonian plain. Sisak is amo...
data.text:
Agrotourism Stara Iža ( Sisak)

Rural tourism "Stara Iža" is located in the center of the Lonjsko polje Nature Park in Kratečko village about 30 km. from Sisak. The apartment is equipped with an LCD TV, air conditioning and Wi-Fi access. As part of the "Stara Iža" rural tourism, guests can also use the services of restaurants where we serve traditional food, and especially the specialty of "Carp on rails", Moslavina wines and plum specialties. As an integral part of the rural tourism there is also a gift of the gallery "Roda -art". Stara Iža offers accommodation in an old (200 g) traditional family house decorated with original furnishings. The apartment is adapted to modern living and consists of a room equipped with a kitchenette and a toilet with a shower. Guests can use the yard terrace, family yard and garden grill Guests can use the yard terrace, the family yard, the parking and the garden grill. Sojourn tax 5.50 kn per guest and day (except children) is charged at the property.

Hostel Odranska Klet ( Sisak)

The Odran Cellar is an accommodation facility,located on the outskirts of the town of Sisak, only about 500meters from the town itself, and1,5 km from the city center. The facility offers comfort, apeaceful and pleasant environment and a beautiful experiece of staying in the city of Sisak. We offer two and fourbad rooms equipped with a privatebathroom, air conditioning, tv and free internet.The accommodation facility is also equipped with a living room,which always available to guests with a kitchen,refrigerators,a self-service coffe machine andtv with over 200different programs. There is also lower terracewith in the building,which is also always available to guests. In the offer, in addition to the previous one, we announce and organize:various sports and recreational activities,boat rides and one - day trips. the Odran Cellar wishes you a pleasant stay in Sisak.
